item.title: mangoto 学习的一些资料
item.description: Magento Test Automation Framework http://www.slideshare.net/amakata/magento-test-automation-framework magento 插件等 http://blog.csdn.net/shuishui8310/article/category/640421/2 Nginx下magento的性能优化配置 http://www.gaojinbo.com/nginx%E4%B8%8Bmagento%E9%85%8D%E7%BD%AE%E4%B8%8E%E6%80%A7%E8%83%BD%E4%BC%98%E5%8C%96.html Magento开发文档(一)：Magento入门 http://www.ruiwant.com/magento-for-dev-part-1-introduction-to-magento.html http://www.sunzhenghua.com/blog/index/directsearch/search_item/magento/blog_search/%E6%90%9C%20%E7%B4%A2/page/1 http://www.sunzhenghua.com/magento-development-systemxml http://www.sunzhenghua.com/magento-add-custom-fields-checkout-page http://blog.csdn.net/shuishui8310/article/month/2011/09 http://www.magentonotes.com/magent-cart-empty-use-different-template.html https://code.google.com/p/sis-css-css/source/browse/my/note/Magento-note.txt?spec=svn87&r=87 http://www.hellokeykey.com/ http://php186.com/content/list/magento/96.html

item.title: 关于magento的名字转化为符合国内的习惯
item.description: 安装中文包后的前台翻译很生硬，找到中文包下的Mage_Customer，用记事本打开，找到First Name，然后把后面的翻译改为自己习惯的
